title: When my suport chooses an off meta champion, the ADC should be allowed to AFK
body:
Pay this no mind, just trying to see how many people downvote without realizing its in M&G <3

How many downvotes you guys think it'll have? xD

replies.body: I was about to send someone look what was a legit thread in GD and I was like wait that's, oooooh I see what you did there.
Almost got me, but I read the body of the post in time. Nice bait.
ARE YOU KIDDING ME??!! TWO WRONGs DON'T MAKE A RIGH-oh....nvm.

I was actually kind of sad upon seeing the title because I liked playing Singed support _before_ that guy ruined it (I built legit support, Face of the Mountain, Sightstone, all that good stuff) but then I sees you aren't really blasting off-meta supports and felt better.

-1
I quite literally main off meta support as a role :P
You're not very good at making sarcastic memes, huh.

What's sarcasm?

I direct you to what this subforum is called. Memes&Games. Emphasis on the last word
but this is more of an experiment than a game tho.  M&G is spongebob/patrick kinda happy-go-lucky feel to it.  this thread has plankton written all over it
I got the idea after reading the downvote contest. I was going to post this as a legit post in player behavior and moderation, but then realized I'd trigger too many support mains out there lol.
then it needs more "XD" and "<3" in the main post

I honestly never use faces like that. The :3 was a huge stretch for me and figured it was enough. I'll take your advice though and even edit it ;D


Oh gosh it feels so weird doing that.
